occupation: Co-Founder & Chief Commercial Officer  ( YC W22 ) at Fresh Factory (YC W22)
headline: Co-Founder & Chief Commercial Officer ( YC W22 ) of Fresh Factory
summary:
25 years working experience at various industries: FMCG, Music industry, low Cost Airline, Media and last Telco Industry has make Widi a very dynamic person. His creativity in solving a problem makes him unique. Great leadership, and people management. 

And now he is a Co-Founder at Fresh Factory which backed by YC-W22. He help the SME in frozen and chilled food products to expands their business cross cities with Fresh Factory’s mini ware house spread all over Indonesia.. 

His passion to Music, Art and Airplane is in-comparable.

Swimming is his Sport. 

Share good things to others, help them to grow and success and still Love of what he is doing is an important thing to drive his success.

experiences.title: Co-Founder & Chief Commercial Officer  ( YC W22 )
experiences.description:
Fresh Factory is a Smart Hyperlocal Fulfilment Centres specialized in Cold Chain Products. 

We help SME distributing their products direct to Consumer thru Market place and e-commerce  

We have 10 Fulfilment centres in Jabodetabek, and 5 all over Jawa.

experiences.title: Chief Commercial Officer
experiences.description:
•	Penetrate the rural villages of Indonesia that has no telco coverage.
•	Securing Home Wifi revenue growth of 20% month on month even during the pandemic Covid-19 
•	Create, launch and grow Rural Kiosk Wifi, it has 100% higher revenue yield compare to Home Wifi. From zero to 2,100 Kiosk wifi in 1.5 years.
•	Launching 100 new sites in Kalimantan and Sulawesi rural area in one month 
•	Expanding corporate Clients to Mining industries, which triple the revenue of B2B in 6 months time

experiences.title: Chief Marketing Officer
experiences.description:
•	Fixing the brand positioning from Teens Mass Low to Upper Mass House Wife and Mom with Kids, this bring Sale Stock turn over growth by 65% Year on Year. 
•	Creating all the TVC and TV Campaign, which bring the Visitors to grow by 70%, apps installed reach record high up to double in 7 months period 
•	Managing all media budget for digital and above the line.
•	Creating efficiency on sponsorship media buying on TV by measuring the CPRP Sponsorship and Cost per Visit to our website and apps.
•	Fixing the role of Instagram to be the e-storefront for Sale Stock, also fixing the imagery of Instagram.
•	Creating Video Content in Face Book and Instagram which increase new Followers and Engagement by 50%

experiences.title: Chief Commercial Officer (CCO)
experiences.description:
•	Setting up campaign management systems. This system shortened the term of payment from 180 days to 120 days. This system also monitor that campaigns are to be delivered on time, it increase the campaign delivery rate from 50% to 90% 
•	Setting up traffic management system, this will manage the inventory, control discount and bonus. It increase the inventory fill rate from 40% to 70% 
•	Creating the new strategy for Woman Network within KLN Network, this strengthens the potential income from FMCG clients who are targeting to housewife and mother with kids. This will generate additional revenue by 25% 
•	Creating the new Brand DNA for Vemale.com, increase the target audience not only 19-24 but also 24-35, who are the active age of woman.  
•	New Content strategy for Social Media as Distribution Channel 
•	New Advertising model of audience targeting and retargeting thru Native ads. The Revenue from This new product is quadrupled in one year.
•	New Advertising model of Native ads thru Social Media distribution channel.
•	Growing Advertising income by 20% from Media Agencies and Clients
•	New Business development thru data mining. This will make Digital Media as Market Research Tools; this is a long-term project that will increase the valuation for KLN Network. 
•	Developing successful Content IP for digital world: AnakArtis3, KapanlagiLupainMantan etc.

experiences.title: Head Of Trading
experiences.description:
•	Shape External environment & enhance Mindshare equity as thought leader.
•	Manage Media Relationships and strengthen Mindshare Equity in the media.
•	Client’s trading objectives - Create Objectives & Strategy, Align clients, and manage the entire delivery of client-aligned objectives
•	New business - Lead & support new business pitches and make trading a competitive advantage
•	System and Data - Compliance with existing systems and continuously improve data management systems in collaboration with other stakeholders 
•	Revenue generation - Create new opportunities and Generate Revenue through Trading initiatives working closely with GroupM trading 
•	Talent Development - Nurture future leaders and make Mindshare hub of best media talent among Mindshare Network Globally

experiences.title: Chief Operating Officer
experiences.description:
•	Set up a Satellite DTH Pay TV business from scratch with an ambition of reaching 5 millions subscribers within 3 years.
•	Create a new business model for Pay-TV, “weekly and daily prepaid service” to cater for mass households in Indonesia.Develop end-to-end process for all operation and commercial part of the business, including payment system, subscriber management system, sales channels [CRM, direct sales in MT outlets] 
•	Resposible for securing funds for the business and seeking them from multinational financial institutions

experiences.title: Commercial Director - AirAsia Indonesia
experiences.description:
•	Responsible for marketing, sales and distribution as well as ancillary income for Indonesia business.
•	Developed and executed marketing strategy to educate and build habit of on-line purchase. The contribution of online purchase to the business grew from 30% to 85%. And Air Asia is now known to spearhead the growth of e-commerce in Indonesia.
•	Pioneered new distribution channel in hypermarket [Carrefour] bringing Air Asia’s online purchasing system closer to consumers 
•	Set up alternative online payment gateway through ATM and direct debit 
•	Successfully extended the Company’s ancillary income to in-flight advertising, In-flight magazine [Travel 360], e-travel insurance [Go-Insure], e-travel service[AirAsia Go-Holiday] and credit card [Air Asia HSBC].
•	The ancillary income business contribution grew from 2% to 25%. 
•	Launched AirAsia-HSBC co-branding credit card reaching 150,000 holder after 3 years, AirAsia-HSBC won the best co-branding credit card in Asia
•	Responsible for conducting due diligence of potential flight routes for Air Asia as well as setting up sales and marketing operation in any new destination
•	Set up new commercial hub in Bali, Bandung Surabaya and Medan.

experiences.title: Unilever Best Foods - Italy
experiences.description:
Manage portfolio of catering products for restaurant, hotels and food industrial companies.
Develop and manage marketing and sales strategy, which resulted increase in the company’s profitability within less than a year
Lead a big project of vending machine with Lavazza Coffee for Italy and five other countries in central Europe and east Europe.
Develop new products category, ethnic sauces and ethnic cuisine in Italy for Hotels, big catering and ready to eat restaurant.

education.field_of_study: Industrial Technology Concentration in Chemical Engineering

accomplishment_courses.name: Unilever Regional Ice Cream Foundation Course
Unilever Regional Ice Cream Marketing Course - Rotterdam, Holland
